Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 kushtarogiyinudaiya Suththigarippin Naalil Avanukkaduththa Pramaanam Ennavendraal: Avan Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvarappadavendum.
3 aasaariyan Paalayaththukkup Purambe Poi; Kushtarogiyin Kushtavyaadhi Sosthamaayitru Endru Kandaal,
4 suththigarikkappadavendiyavanukkaaga, Uyirodirukkum Suththamaana Irandu Kuruvigalaiyum, Kedhuruk Kattaiyaiyum, Sivappunoolaiyum, Eesoppaiyum Vaangivarakkadavan.
5 pinbu, Aasaariyan Andhak Kuruvigalil Ondrai Oru Manpaandaththilulla Ootruneermel Kolla Solli,
6 uyirulla Kuruviyaiyum, Kedhuruk Kattaiyaiyum, Sivappunoolaiyum, Eesoppaiyum Eduththu, Ivaigalaiyum Uyirulla Kuruviyaiyum Ootruneermel Kollappatta Kuruviyin Raththaththile Thoiththu,
7 kushtam Neenga Suththigarikkappadugiravanmel Ezhudharam Theliththu, Avanai Suththampanni, Uyirulla Kuruviyai Veliyile Vittuvidakkadavan.

8 suththigarikkappadugiravan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Than Mayir Muzhuvadhaiyum Siraiththu, Thaan Suththamaagumpadi Jalaththil Snaanampanni, Pinbu Paalayaththil Pravesiththu, Than Koodaaraththukkup Purambe Ezhunaal Thangi,

9 ezhaam Naalile Than Thalaiyaiyum Thaadiyaiyum Puruvangalaiyum Thannudaiya Mayir Muzhuvadhaiyum Siraiththu, Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Jalaththil Snaanampannavendum; Appozhudhu Suththamaayiruppaan.

10 ettaamnaalile Avan Pazhudhatra Irandu Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Oru Pennaattukkuttiyaiyum, Pojanapalikkaaga Enneyile Pisaindha Oru Marakkaalil Paththil Moondru Pangaagiya Melliya Maavaiyum, Aazhaakku Enneyaiyum Konduvarakkadavan.
11 suththigarikkira Aasaariyan Suththigarikkappadum Manidhanaiyum Avvasthukkalaiyum Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Niruththakkadavan.
12 pinbu, Aasaariyan Oru Aattukkuttiyaip Pidiththu, Adhaiyum Andha Aazhaakku Enneyaiyum Kutranivaaranapaliyaagak Konduvandhu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Paliyaaga Asaivaatti,

13 paavanivaaranapaliyum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyum Idum Parisuththa Sthalaththile Andha Aattukkuttiyaik Kollakkadavan; Kutranivaaranapali Paavanivaaranapaliyaippola Aasaariyanukku Uriyadhu; Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.

14 andhak Kutranivaaranapaliyin Raththaththil Aasaariyan Konjam Eduththu, Suththigarikkappadugiravan Valadhu Kaadhin Madalilum, Avan Valadhu Kaiyin Peruviralilum, Valadhukaalin Peruviralilum Poosakkadavan.
15 pinbu, Aasaariyan Andha Aazhaakku Enneyile Konjam Than Idadhu Kaiyil Vaarththu,
16 than Idadhu Kaiyilulla Enneyil Than Valadhu Kaiyin Viralaith Thoiththu, Than Viralinaal Ezhudharam Andha Enneyil Eduththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Theliththu,

17 than Ullankaiyil Irukkira Meedhiyaana Enneyile Konjam Eduththu Suththigarikkappadugiravan Valadhukaadhin Madalilum, Avan Valadhukaiyin Peruviralilum, Mundhap Poosiyirukkira Kutranivaaranapaliyinudaiya Raththaththinmel Poosi,
18 than Ullankaiyil Irukkira Meedhiyaana Enneyai Suththigarikkappadugiravan Thalaiyile Vaarththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avanukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan.
19 aasaariyan Paavanivaaranapaliyaiyum Seluththi, Suththigarikkappadugiravanin Theettu Neenga, Avanukkup Paavanivirththi Seydhu, Pinbu Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaikkondru,
20 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Pojanapaliyaiyum Palipeedaththinmel Vaiththu, Avanukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Avan Suththamaayiruppaan.

21 avan Immaaththiram Seyyath Thiraaniyatra Thariththiranaayirundhaal, Avan Than Paavanivirththikkendru Asaivaattum Kutranivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyum, Pojanapalikku Enneyil Pisaindha Oru Marakkaal Melliya Maavile Paththil Oru Pangaiyum, Aazhaakku Enneyaiyum,
22 than Thiraanikkuth Thakkapadi Irandu Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu Ondru Paavanivaaranapaliyaagavum, Matrondru Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum Seluththumpadi Vaangi,
23 thaan Suththigarikkumpadi Ettaam Naalil Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Aasaariyanidaththukkuk Konduvaruvaanaaga.
24 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Kutranivaaranapalikkuriya Aattukkuttiyaiyum Andha Aazhaakku Enneyaiyum Vaangi, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Pojanapaliyaaga Asaivaatti,

25 kutranivaaranapalikkaana Andha Aattukkuttiyaik Kondru, Kutranivaaranapaliyin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Suththigarikkappadugiravan Valadhu Kaadhin Madalilum, Avan Valadhukaiyin Peruviralilum, Valadhukaalin Peruviralilum Poosi,
26 andha Enneyile Konjam Than Idadhukaiyil Vaarththu,
27 than Idadhu Kaiyilulla Enneyile Than Valadhu Viralaith Thoiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ezhudharam Theliththu,

28 than Ullankaiyilirukkira Enneyil Konjam Eduththu Suththigarikkappadugiravan Valadhukaadhin Madalilum, Avan Valadhu Kaiyin Peruviralilum, Valadhukaalin Peruviralilum Kutranivaaranapaliyin Raththam Poosiyirukkira Idaththile Poosi,
29 than Ullankaiyil Irukkira Matra Enneyai Suththigarikkappadugiravan Thalaiyinmel Avanukkaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadi Thadavi,
30 pinbu, Avan Than Thiraanikkum Thagudhikkum Thakkadhaaik Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu Konduvandhu,

31 avaigalil Ondraip Paavanivaaranapaliyum, Matrondrai Sarvaangadhaganapaliyumaakki, Pojanapaliyodekooda Seluththi, Ippadiye Aasaariyan Suththigarikkappadugiravanukkaaga, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan.
32 than Suththigarippukku Vendiyavaigalai Sambaadhikkak Koodaadha Kushtarogiyaik Kuriththa Pramaanam Idhuve Endraar.
33 pinnum Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
34 naan Ungalukkuk Kaaniyaatchiyaagak Kodukkum Dhesaththile Neengal Poi Serndhapinbu, Ungal Kaaniyaatchiyaana Dhesaththil Oru Veettile Kushtadhoshaththai Naan Varappanninaal,
35 andha Veettirku Udaiyavan Vandhu, Veettile Thosham Vandhirukkiradhaagath Thondrugiradhu Endru Aasaariyanukku Arivikkakkadavan.
36 appozhudhu Veettilulla Yaavum Theettuppadaadhapadikku, Aasaariyan Andhath Thoshaththaip Paarkkap Pogummunne Veettai Ozhiththuvaikkumpadi Solli, Pinbu Veettaippaarkkumpadi Poi,

37 andhath Thosham Irukkira Idaththaip Paarkkakkadavan; Appozhudhu Veettu Suvargalile Konjam Pachchaiyum Konjam Sivappumaana Kuzhi Vizhundhirundhu, Avaigal Matra Suvaraippaarkkilum Pallamaayirukkakkandaal,
38 aasaariyan Veettaivittup Purappattu Vaasarpadiyile Vandhu, Veettai Ezhunaal Adaiththuvaiththu,
39 ezhaamnaalile Thirumbap Poip Paarththu, Thosham Veettu Suvargalil Padarndhadhendru Kandaal,
40 thosham Irukkum Avvidaththuk Kallugalaip Peyarkkavum, Pattanaththukku Purambe Asuththamaana Oru Idaththile Podavum Avan Kattalaiyittu,
41 veettai Ulle Sutrilum Sedhukkachcholli, Sedhukkippotta Mannaip Pattanaththukkup Purambe Asuththamaana Oru Idaththile Kottavum,
42 vere Kallugalai Eduththuvandhu, Andhak Kallugalukkup Padhilaagak Katti, Vere Saandhai Eduththu Veettaip Poosavum Kattalaiyiduvaanaaga.
43 kallugalaip Peyarththu, Veettai Sedhukki, Navamaaip Poosinapinbum, Andhath Thosham Thirumba Veettil Vandhadhaanaal,
44 aasaariyan Poip Paarkkakadavan; Thosham Veettil Padarndhadhaanaal, Adhu Veettai Arikkira Kushtam, Adhu Theettaayirukkum.
45 aagaiyaal Veedumuzhuvadhaiyum Idiththu, Adhin Kallugalaiyum, Marangalaiyum, Adhin Saandhu Ellaavatraiyum Pattanaththukkup Purambe Asuththamaana Idaththile Kondupogavendum.
46 veedu Adaikkappattirukkum Naatkalil Adharkul Pravesikkiravan Saayankaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
47 andha Veettile Paduththavan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Andha Veettile Saappittavanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan.

48 aasaariyan Thirumba Vandhu, Veedu Poosappattapinbu Veettile Andhath Thosham Padaravillai Endru Kandaaneyaagil, Thosham Nivirththiyaanapadiyaal, Aasaariyan Andha Veettai Suththam Endru Theerkkakkadavan.
49 appozhudhu Veettirkuth Thosham Kazhikka, Irandu Kuruvigalaiyum, Kedhuruk Kattaiyaiyum, Sivappunoolaiyum, Eesoppaiyum Eduththu,
50 oru Kuruviyai Oru Manpaandaththilulla Ootruneerinmel Kondru,
51 kedhurukkattaiyaiyum, Eesoppaiyum, Sivappunoolaiyum, Uyirulla Kuruviyaiyum Eduththu, Ivaigalaik Kollappatta Kuruviyin Raththaththilum Ootru Neerilum Thoiththu, Veettinmel Ezhudharam Theliththu,
52 kuruviyin Raththaththinaalum, Ootruneerinaalum, Uyirulla Kuruviyinaalum, Kedhurukkattaiyinaalum Eesoppinaalum, Sivappunoolinaalum Veettirkuth Thoshankazhiththu,
53 uyirulla Kuruviyaip Pattanaththukkup Purambe Veliyile Vittuvittu, Ippadi Veettirkup Praayachchiththam Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Suththamaayirukkum.
54 idhu Sagalavidha Kushtarogaththukkum, Sorikkum,
55 vasthirak Kushtaththukkum, Veettuk Kushtaththukkum,
56 thadippukkum, Asarukkum, Vellaip Padarukkum Aduththa Pramaanam.
57 kushtam Eppozhudhu Theettulladhu Endrum, Eppozhudhu Theettillaadhadhu Endrum Therivippadharkuk Kushtarogaththukku Aduththa Pramaanam Idhuve Endraar.
